projects.title: Landing Page Template
projects.desc: Landing Page Template — fast, responsive marketing site with smooth motion.
projects.problem: You need a production-ready UI foundation without reinventing layouts every time.
projects.system: Reusable components + consistent motion + responsive grid + theme support.
projects.solution: A clean, responsive startup landing with premium motion + sections.
projects.impact: Faster shipping, consistent UX, and a strong base to plug real data/features into.

highlights.title: Conversion layout
highlights.desc: Landing Page Template uses a proven hero → features → CTA flow for higher sign-ups.

highlights.title: Motion polish
highlights.desc: Scroll reveals and hover micro-interactions tuned for the Landing Page Template.

highlights.title: Easy customization
highlights.desc: Swap colors, sections, and content in the Landing Page Template without touching layout logic.

projects.title: Admin Dashboard UI
projects.desc: Admin Dashboard UI — SaaS-style dashboard with cards, tables, and states.
projects.problem: You need a production-ready UI foundation without reinventing layouts every time.
projects.system: Reusable components + consistent motion + responsive grid + theme support.
projects.solution: Modern dashboard layout patterns (cards, tables, states) ready to wire to data.
projects.impact: Faster shipping, consistent UX, and a strong base to plug real data/features into.

highlights.title: Real SaaS patterns
highlights.desc: Admin Dashboard UI includes cards, tables, filters, and empty/loading states.

highlights.title: Scales with data
highlights.desc: Admin Dashboard UI is structured to plug into Firebase/REST APIs cleanly.

highlights.title: Operator-friendly UX
highlights.desc: Admin Dashboard UI keeps actions obvious with clear hierarchy and spacing.

projects.title: Auth + Profile Flow
projects.desc: Auth + Profile Flow — login/signup/profile screens with clean form UX.
projects.problem: You need a production-ready UI foundation without reinventing layouts every time.
projects.system: Reusable components + consistent motion + responsive grid + theme support.
projects.solution: Login/signup screens with polished forms, states, and UX details.
projects.impact: Faster shipping, consistent UX, and a strong base to plug real data/features into.

highlights.title: Form UX details
highlights.desc: Auth + Profile Flow handles validation, errors, and focus states smoothly.

highlights.title: Cohesive journey
highlights.desc: Auth + Profile Flow connects signup → onboarding → profile without UI mismatch.

highlights.title: Trust & security cues
highlights.desc: Auth + Profile Flow uses clear feedback, password rules, and safe defaults.
